testcase.name: Verify login function with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given customer landed on loginpage..........................................passed When customer enter username and password...................................passed Then customer should land on homepage.......................................passed And click on login button...................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify login function with Invalid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given customer landed on loginpage..........................................passed When customer enter username and password...................................passed Then it should throw some error invalid username............................passed And click on login button...................................................passed
